thread.title: Dude has Tom Brady to thank for his date with Genie Bouchard (24 Photos)
thread.title_full: Dude has Tom Brady to thank for his date with Genie Bouchard (24 Photos)

author: Martin
title: Dude has Tom Brady to thank for his date with Genie Bouchard (24 Photos)
text:
Twitter/geniebouchard 
You know that feeling you get waking up in the morning after one hell of a night out partying? Where you’re not sure what you said, who you did and what you committed to, while under the influence? Yeah, those nights? Canadian tennis hottie Genie Bouchard just had one of those mornings. 
We’re not sure what she was up to on Super Bowl Sunday, all we know is that she was watching the game, and like the rest of us, figured the Pats were done for. She may have shared such a sentiment on Twitter , and it got her in a little bit of trouble. 2 
Here’s the tweet, which was sent out during halftime, when the game looked to be all but in the bag. 3 
So a lucky fan decided to throw a Hail Mary down the field and put his faith and trust in Tom Brady. 4 
Of course, she said yeah, because who wouldn’t take that action. Going into the halftime show with a 18 point deficit, no one could see this game going any other way but Atlanta’s. 5 Twitter/geniebouchard 
Then things started to a little sideways for the Falcons, so another fan wanted to get in on the action. 
Don’t know about you but that emoji shutdown was a little savage AF. She’s cute, but deadly. Advertisement
